price: 14. Should not He Who has created know? And He is the Most Kind and Courteous (to His slaves), All-Aware (of everything).
arabic: أَلَا يَعۡلَمُ مَنۡ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: alā yaʿlamu man khalaqa wahuwa al-laṭīfu al-khabīru
